channel.title: Business Analytics Organization
channel.description: Recent content on Business Analytics Organization

item.title: About
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Organizational Overview The Business Analytics Organization (BAO) was formed to promote the intellectual and professional development of students with an interest in business analytics. We intend to create a common platform for analytics enthusiasts and help share their views and grow as a community. We have events such as Analytics Speaker Series, Data Science Workshops, and Networking Events as part of our initiatives. The Data Science Workshops are a series of hands-on workshops organized by BAO for a better understanding of various concepts by students.

item.title: Contact
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> To get in contact with our team, please feel free to either email us at uic.bao.master@gmail.com or to make use of the form below. ​ Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message

item.title: Events
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> The Business Analytics Organization (BAO) is a student organization that fosters interaction and networking with industry experts and leaders in the field of analytics and data science. Workshops and networking events expose students to different technologies and application areas. ​ Events hosted by BAO include: Coffee Chats and Brown Bags, where professors speak about their research and share an informal conversation with students. Speaker Series, where leaders in the industry come and speak to our members about their career’s trajectory and what they do in their role.

item.title: Leadership
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> BAO is led by the following Students and Faculty Partners. ​ Board Saurav Anand - President in Saurav is pursuing MS in Business Analytics. The ability to make the future less unpredictable by using Data Science to solve numeours challenegs brought him to this path. He sees himself leading a team of like minded analysts to help organizations such as WHO and UN to give back to the community.

item.title: Membership
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> The Business Analytics Organization (BAO) is a student organization that fosters interaction and networking with industry experts and leaders in the field of analytics and data science. Workshops and networking events expose students to different technologies and application areas. ​ Becoming a BAO Member To become a BAO member the steps are as follows- $25 Fee to be assessed by quick-paying (Zelle) our Treasurer, Sravya Tangirala. (see contact information below) Once we receive your payment, Sravya will reach out with an email and link to our membership information survey.
